Powers.Name: Lucky
Powers.Text: When you roll a 1 on an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

Powers.Name: Brave
Powers.Text: You have advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

Powers.Name: Halfling Nimbleness
Powers.Text: You can move through the space of any creature that is of a size larger than yours.
